snippet.textDisplay:
பச்ச கரு யாவும் பாவ கரு அல்ல
நீயும் நானும் யாரு குத்தங்கொற சொல்ல

பொத்தல் உள்ள மூங்கிள்ள சத்தமுள்ள பாட்டு வரும்

கன்னங்கரு மேகம் தான்
உயிர் வாழ பயிர் வாழ மழை கொட்டுதே

ஒரு ஊரில் ஒரு குடிசை
நதியோரும் பச்ச மரம் பல வரிசை
கள்ளமில்லா வெள்ளந்தியா
ஊருசனம் இருந்ததய்யா

ஆரிரோ ஆரிரோ ஆரிராரிரோ
ஆரிரோ ஆரிரோ ஆரிராரிரோ

ஆலங்காத்த ஓசையிலே
மொத்த சனம் தூக்கத்திலே
பூமி ரொம்ப தூரத்திலே
யார் அறிவார் காரணத்த
ஏன் பிறந்தாய் ஏன் பிறந்தாய் ஏன் பிறந்தாயோ

நான் ஏன் பிறந்தேன்
கண் ஏன் திறந்தேன்
எனக்கே தெறியாதே
இறையோன் படைப்பில்
எதுவும் அழகே

அப்போ அப்போ எனக்கு தோணும் இது ஆனால் எதும் புறியெளை இது வரைக்கும் 🙄😭🙄நான் ஏன் பிறந்தேன் 🙄😭🙄
 இன்ஷாஅல்லாஹ் பார்க்கலாம் வரும் காலங்களில் எதும் தெரியுதா என்னனு ❤️😘❤️😘❤️😘❤️ ஐ லவ் ரஹ்மான் baiyaa ❤️😘❤️ ஆமா உண்மையிலேயே எனக்கு தெரியலை நான் ஏன் பிறந்தேன் ❤️ ❤️😘❤️😘❤️😘

snippet.textDisplay:
Can’t understand a word…Still can’t get enough of this one 💛💛❤️❤️🥰😍👌

For the interest of others here’s the translation

Pachcha karu yaavum paavakkaru alla
Neeyum naanum yaaru kuththam kora solla

All those fetuses are not sinned
Who are you and I
to find a fault in?

Poththal ulla moongilla saththamulla paattu varum

A hole in the bamboo stick
Brings out a good song

Kannangaru megam thaan
uyir vaazha payir vaazha mazhai kottuthey
Even the clouds turn dark and black
to bring the rain back
for survival of crops and
for survival of mankind!

Oru ooril oru gudisai
Nadhiyoram pachcha maram pala varisai
Kallamillaa Vellanthiyaa
Oorusanam Irunthathayya

A hut in a village
Green trees lined up by the river
And there lived people
that are Open and innocent...

Aariro....Aariro...Aaraariro...(Lullaby)

Aalangaaththu Oasaiyiley
Moththa sanam thookkaththiley
Boomi Romba Thoorathiley
Yaar Arivaar Kaaranaththa?
Yen Piranthaai? Yen Piranthaai? Yen Piranthaayo??

In the sound of the banyan tree
Everyone in deep sleep
Earth is so far away
And who would know the reason?
Why are you born?  Why are you born? Why are you born?

Naan yen piranthen?
Kan yen thiranthen?
Enakkey theriyaathey

Why am I born?
Why did I open my eyes?
I do not know

O! Iraiyoan padaippil
Yethuvum azhage
Un kann ariyaathey!

In God’s creations
Anything is beautiful and
Your eyes won’t know that!

Naan yen piranthen?
Kan yen thiranthen?
Enakkey theriyaathey...

Why am I born?
Why did I open my eyes?
I do not know...

Pachcha karu yaavum paavakkaru alla
Neeyum naanum yaaru kuththam kora solla
All those fetuses are not sinned
Who are you and I,
to find a fault in?

Poththal ulla moongilla saththamulla paattu varum

A hole in the bamboo stick
Brings out a good song

Kannangaru megam thaan
uyir vaazha payir vaazha mazhai kottuthey
Even the clouds turn dark and black
But they bring the rain back
For survival of crops!
For survival of mankind!!

Naan yen piranthen?
Kan yen thiranthen?
Enakkey theriyaathey...

Why am I born?
Why did I open my eyes?
I do not know...

Yaaro yaar arivaaro?
Yenna solvaaro sol...
Who would know?
What would they say?

Yaaro yaar arivaaro?
Yenna seiyvaaro sollu...sollu...sollu...

Who would know?
What would they do?

Naan yen piranthen?
Kan yen thiranthen?
Enakkey theriyaathey....

Why am I born?
Why did I open my eyes?
I do not know..…..❤️❤️💛💛

snippet.textDisplay: I’m from Sri Lanka and I also cannot understand a single Tamil word except amma & appa even though Madras is the nearest Indian city to us. But after listening to some Tamil movie songs (A R Rahman, Hariharan) with subtitles I started to appreciate the realistic cinematography, melodies and the meaningful lyrics of those songs. They are art-wise beyond the so-called North Indian commercial cinema music which is apparently burrowed Pakistani Talent in most cases. For example this particular song is definitely derived from Tamil falk music and polished by AR Rahman in to a fine piece of art 👍
snippet.textOriginal: I’m from Sri Lanka and I also cannot understand a single Tamil word except amma & appa even though Madras is the nearest Indian city to us. But after listening to some Tamil movie songs (A R Rahman, Hariharan) with subtitles I started to appreciate the realistic cinematography, melodies and the meaningful lyrics of those songs. They are art-wise beyond the so-called North Indian commercial cinema music which is apparently burrowed Pakistani Talent in most cases. For example this particular song is definitely derived from Tamil falk music and polished by AR Rahman in to a fine piece of art 👍

snippet.textDisplay:
Nan Yen  -- English Translation
   Original Tamizh lyrics by : Vaali

    Pachcha karu yaavum paavakkaru alla
    Neeyum naanum yaaru kuththam kora solla

    All those fetuses are not sinned
    Who are you and I to find a fault in with them?

    Poththal ulla moongilla saththamulla paattu varum

    Bamboo with lot of holes
    Brings out a loud, melodious songs

    Kannangaru megam thaan
    uyir vaazha payir vaazha mazhai kottuthey
    Even the clouds turn black
    and pours down the rain
    for survival of crops and
    for the survival of lives

    Oru ooril oru gudisai
    Nadhiyoram pachcha maram pala varisai
    Kallamillaa Vellanthiyaa
    Oorusanam Irunthathayya

    A hut in a village
    Green trees lined up by the river
    And there lived people
    that are wihtout cunningness and innocent...

    Aariro....Aariro...Aaraariro...(Lullaby)

    Aalangaaththu Oasaiyiley
    Moththa sanam thookkaththiley
    Boomi Romba Thoorathiley
    Yaar Arivaar Kaaranaththa?
    Yen Piranthaai? Yen Piranthaai? Yen Piranthaayo??

    In the sound of wind over the banyan tree
    All people are fast sleep
    Earth is so far away
    And who would know the reason?
    Why were you born?  Why were you born? Why were you born?

    Naan yen piranthen?
    Kan yen thiranthen?
    Enakkey theriyaathey

    Why was I born?
    Why did I open my eyes?
    I myslef do not know

    O! Iraiyoan padaippil
    Yethuvum azhage
    Un kann ariyaathey!

    In God’s creations
    Everything is beautiful and
    Your eyes won’t know that!

    Naan yen piranthen?
    Kan yen thiranthen?
    Enakkey theriyaathey...

    Why was I born?
    Why did I open my eyes?
    I do not know...

    Pachcha karu yaavum paavakkaru alla
    Neeyum naanum yaaru kuththam kora solla

    All those fetuses are not sinned
    Who are you and I to find a fault in?

    Poththal ulla moongilla saththamulla paattu varum

    Holes in the bamboo
    Brings out a good song


    Kannangaru megam thaan
    uyir vaazha payir vaazha mazhai kottuthey
    Even the clouds turn black
    and pours down the rain
    for survival of crops and
    for the survival of lives

    Naan yen piranthen?
    Kan yen thiranthen?
    Enakkey theriyaathey...

    Why was I born?
    Why did I open my eyes?
    I do not know...

    Yaaro yaar arivaaro?
    Yenna solvaaro sol...
    Who would know?
    What would they say? tell me?

    Yaaro yaar arivaaro?
    Yenna seiyvaaro sollu...sollu...sollu...

    Who would know?
    What would they do? tell me? tell me? tell me?

    Naan yen piranthen?
    Kan yen thiranthen?
    Enakkey theriyaathey....

    Why was I born?
    Why did I open my eyes?
    I do not know...

நான் ஏன்
  கவிஞர் : வாலி

பச்சக் கரு யாவும் பாவக்கரு அல்ல 
நீயும் நானும் யாரு குத்தம்கொர சொல்ல 
பொத்தல் உள்ள மூங்கில்ல சத்தமுள்ள பாட்டு வரும் 
கன்னங்கரு மேகம் தான் உயிர் வாழ பயிர் வாழ மழ கொட்டுதே

ஒரு ஊரில் ஒரு குடிச 
நதியோரம் பச்ச மரம் பல வரிச 
கள்ளமில்லா வெள்ளந்தியா ஊரு சனம் இருந்ததையா

ஓ... ஆரிரோ... ஆரிரோ... ஆரிராரிரோ.. ஆரிரோ... ஆரிரோ... ஆரிரோ.

ஆலங்காத்து ஓசயில 
மொத்த சனம் தூக்கத்துல 
பூமி ரொம்ப தூரத்துல‌ 
யாரறிவார் காரணத்த‌ 
ஏன் பிறந்தாய் ஏன் பிறந்தாய் ஏன் பிறந்தாய் ?

நான் ஏன் பிறந்தேன் 
கண் ஏன் திறந்தேன் 
எனக்கே தெரியாதே

snippet.textDisplay:
Two days which are very important in a humans life 
1. The day you were born
2. The day you realize why you were born.

Look around and  think deep you'll get the answer

snippet.textDisplay: Amazing composition, lyrics, picturization, instrumental arrangements and of course Rahman Sir's singing style.. even in the high pitch not showing any tough reactions in his face.. pure heart shows in his face ❣️ we support you sir. God bless!!
